arts.sum: Minute-by-minute report from Vicarage Road as Vakoun Bayo scores twice to help secure an excellent 2-1 victory.

arts.ttl: Championship: Burnley bounce back to sink Norwich and retake third
arts.sum: Josh Brownhill fires second-half winner for Clarets Vakoun Bayo doubles up as Watford beat West Brom Burnley recovered from the shock of conceding a goal after just 64 seconds to reclaim third place in the Championship by beating Norwich with a 2-1 comeback victory at Carrow Road, while Watford won by the same score at home to West Brom. The Norwich defender José Cordoba headed home his first goal in English football to give his side a dream start, but the visitors hit back in impressive fashion after the break to take home maximum points. The substitute Zian Flemming’s brilliant long-range strike levelled it for the Clarets midway through the second period and another emphatic finish from Josh Brownhill settled the issued eight minutes later. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Bayo scores twice as Watford beat West Brom to boost play-off hopes
arts.sum: Two sweetly-taken goals by Vakoun Bayo gave Watford a 2-1 victory over West Brom at Vicarage Road that lifted Tom Cleverley's side back into play-off contention.

arts.ttl: Vakoun Bayo scores twice as Watford beat West Brom to boost play-off hopes
arts.sum: The victory lifted the Hornets above their opponents and into seventh place in the Sky Bet Championship.

arts.ttl: Albion are unbeaten in 12 and pose real threat to Watford's home run
arts.sum: Tom Cleverley feels his side have the tools to beat an Albion side that is unbeaten in 12 games, but has drawn 10 of them.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Championship predictions including Watford vs. West Brom
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Championship fixtures, including Watford vs. West Bromwich Albion.

arts.ttl: Watkiss is on the Market as Watford's latest loanee
arts.sum: Jake Watkiss made his debut for Needham Market today while James Clarridge was in action for St Albans City.

arts.ttl: Watford vs West Brom predictions: Baggies ready to hurt Hornets
arts.sum: West Brom look set to inflict a first home Championship defeat of the season on Watford when they go to Vicarage Road on Sunday, says Aidan Perkins.

arts.ttl: Carlos Corberan reveals fatigue concern over West Brom ace
arts.sum: “A player that is more in doubt is Grant because after the last game he was feeling fatigue and he has not been in his normal condition but still we have time. "Grady has trained today [Friday] but we need to wait because the previous game he was training but the last day he was feeling pain.

arts.ttl: Five goalscorers to watch out for this weekend: Griezmann to continue hot streak
arts.sum: Antoine Griezmann has been in flying form for Atletico Madrid in recent weeks and is one of Jamie Griffith’s five goalscorers to look out for this weekend.
